title.rendered: BuiltWorlds November Venture Call Featuring Dr. Ray Levitt Of Blackhorn Ventures

November Venture Call: VC & Accelerator Relationships With Their Portfolio On BuiltWorlds

BuiltWorlds, a leading community for groups that operate in the Built Environment recently had Dr. Ray Levitt participates in an analyst call regarding how VCs and Accelerators work with their portfolio companies. To hear Ray’s thoughts and learn more, check it out at BuiltWorlds.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_button button_url=”https://builtworlds.com/videos/november-venture-call-vc-accelerator-relationships-portfolio/” url_new_window=”on” button_text=”Watch Now” button_alignment=”center” _builder_version=”4.6.6″ custom_button=”on” button_font=”||||||||” button_icon=”%%40%%”][/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” module_class=” et_pb_row_fullwidth” _builder_version=”3.25″ width=”89%” width_tablet=”80%” width_phone=”” width_last_edited=”on|desktop” max_width=”89%” max_width_tablet=”80%” max_width_phone=”” max_width_last_edited=”on|desktop” custom_padding=”30px|8%|0px|8%|false|true” custom_padding_tablet=”|5%||5%||true” custom_padding_phone=”|3%||3%||true” make_fullwidth=”on”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_button button_url=”/blog/” button_text=”Back To Blog” button_alignment=”center” _builder_version=”3.19.17″ custom_button=”on” button_font=”||||||||” button_icon=”%%41%%”][/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ admin_label=”Post Footer” _builder_version=”3.18.7″ background_color=”#000000″ custom_margin=”||-140px” border_style_all=”none” border_width_top=”0.8px” border_color_top=”#ffffff” global_module=”1161″][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_6,1_6,1_6″ _builder_version=”3.25″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” border_style_all=”none”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text admin_label=”Based in Boulder” _builder_version=”4.5.3″ text_font=”|600|||||||” text_text_color=”#ffffff” header_6_text_color=”#7dcbb6″ header_6_font_size=”15px” header_6_line_height=”1.6em” custom_margin=”10px||”]

Based in Colorado. Click here to learn why

Privacy Policy  |  GDPR Compliance
